nodes.text: Karris was an Imperial Commander who reported to Moff Delian Mors, the Commander of the Imperial Forces on Ryloth. He served under her when the rebel YT-209 freighter Eclipse undertook a smuggling run into Ryloth. Despite their efforts, the rebels eluded Imperial capture.

Karris was an Imperial Commander who answered to Moff Delian Mors, the Governor of Ryloth and commander of local Imperial forces. In 13 BBY, he was stationed at the Imperial space traffic control station on Ryloth. After the rebel YT-209 freighter Eclipse breached the Imperial defenses above Ryloth and disengaged from the auto-control. This created a power glitch in the Imperial grid and Karris promised that his technicians would repair the systems. The technician Denner then reported that they were missing one freighter, the Tirion.

Mors then instructed Karris to send Lieutenant Niol's flight of V-wing starfighters to search for the mission freighter. In truth, the Tirion was actually the rebel freighter Eclipse, which was smuggling gattis-root extract to Lessu. After the Eclipse evaded Imperial forces and managed to deliver its cargo to Lessu, Mors ordered Karris to lock down the city and to order the warship Despot to intercept the YT-209 freighter. However, the Eclipse managed to evade Imperial forces and flee into hyperspace. When Mors ordered a full lockdown of the city, Karris speculated that the ship crew were smugglers. However, Mors replied that she was determined to obtain information on the freighter, the cargo, and its recipients.
